meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unlikely.
meanings.sent1: The unlikelihood of winning the lottery is very high.
meanings.sent2: There is an unlikelihood of finding a four-leaf clover.
meanings.sent3: The unlikelihood of a penguin flying made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her unlikelihood of being a morning person was as clear as day.
meanings.sent5: The unlikelihood of a snowstorm in July is quite striking.

meanings.definition: Something that is unlikely to happen.
meanings.sent1: The unlikelihood of a unicorn existing is widely accepted.
meanings.sent2: She faced the unlikelihood of meeting her favorite celebrity.
meanings.sent3: The unlikelihood of a cat walking on two legs is amusing to imagine.
meanings.sent4: His unlikelihood of ever skydiving was a constant topic of conversation.
meanings.sent5: The unlikelihood of a volcano erupting in the desert is quite vivid.
